column4: Can anybody help me? How come my movie freezes while I'm watching it? This didn't happen to me in Windows, so it's not my computer's fault
just the movie or the computer?  have you tried different players?
just the movie, I tried VLC
try playing from command line with mplayer/ffmpeg , maybe it will throw an error?
what exactly am I supposed to write in the terminal, before that? gksudo?
depending on your proficiency..navigate to the directory with the movie file and try 'mplayer <name of movie>' or 'ffmpeg <name of movie>'
To be honest, I have no idea how to do that, I'm a newbie using Linux
well just try different players first you should have several listed in the menu
Ok, thanks, I'll try the VLC again now
I downloaded VLC, I played the movie, but it's the same: It all goes smooth but then sometimes it slows down or downright freezes for somet ime
do you have other movies to try
Not really, at least for now, but the movie did work well with the windows player on windows
do you know how to open a terminal?
Yes
navigate the terminal at all?
I can open it... lol
I only know gksudo, that's al for commands
do you know the directory your movie is in?
Yes
do you know how to use the cd command and pwd?
no
ill msg you so we don't spam the channel and hold your hand through the terminal ;)
alright and thanks, aaas
